description:
We have some hacks to work around the pep8 tool complaining about 3-arg raises.

The latest version of pep8 (0.7) fixes this issue, so we can modify the pip-requires to use >=0.7 and remove these hacks.
title: Remove 3-arg raise hacks

comments.content:
We have some hacks to work around the pep8 tool complaining about 3-arg raises.

The latest version of pep8 (0.7) fixes this issue, so we can modify the pip-requires to use >=0.7 and remove these hacks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rconradharris

comments.content:
The patch that went into pep8 0.7 didn't fully fix this warning issue. 

raise t, v, tb  # works
raise ty, val, tb # W602 warning

Submitted patch to the project:

https://github.com/jcrocholl/pep8/pull/53
